tag_list: israel, orliyakuel, go2web20, web2-0, eyalshahar, directory, technology, blogger
overview:
Orli Yakuel is a Web2.0 analyst and the editor of Go2web20 - A personal blog about Web2.0 technology.

She’s also a co-founder at Go2web20.net - which is a directory for Web2.0 applications. (in association with Eyal Shahar)
